statements: SELECT * FROM ConflictResolution;
SELECT id, legal_document FROM ConflictResolution;
SELECT agreement, case_study FROM ConflictResolution;
SELECT id, agreement, legal_document FROM ConflictResolution;
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolution ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT legal_document, agreement FROM ConflictResolution WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolution WHERE agreement != 'None' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, legal_document FROM ConflictResolution WHERE agreement IS NOT NULL AND case_study LIKE '%example%';
SELECT DISTINCT agreement FROM ConflictResolution ORDER BY agreement ASC;
SELECT id, legal_document, agreement, case_study FROM ConflictResolution WHERE legal_document LIKE '%legal%' OR case_study IN ('example1', 'example2') ORDER BY id ASC, agreement DESC;
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM LegalDocuments;
SELECT document_id, document_title FROM LegalDocuments WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CaseStudies;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_description FROM CaseStudies;
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments ORDER BY document_title ASC;
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM LegalDocuments WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CaseStudies WHERE case_name LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT case_name, COUNT(related_documents) FROM CaseStudies GROUP BY case_name HAVING COUNT(related_documents) > 3;
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments JOIN CaseStudies ON LegalDocuments.document_id = ANY(CaseStudies.related_documents);
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_title, document_type from legal_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_title, document_type FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Contract';
SELECT * FROM agreements ORDER BY agreement_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_type, party1_id, party2_id FROM agreements WHERE agreement_type = 'Service';
SELECT document_id, document_title, document_type FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_title, document_type FROM legal_documents ORDER BY document_type DESC;
SELECT party1_id, agreement_type, agreement_date FROM agreements WHERE agreement_type = 'Sales';
SELECT case_id, case_title, related_documents FROM case_studies WHERE case_title LIKE '%Marketing%';
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_type, agreement_date FROM agreements WHERE agreement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM agreements ORDER BY agreement_name DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_text FROM legal_documents WHERE document_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM case_studies WHERE case_study_id < 10 ORDER BY case_study_id ASC;
SELECT info_name, related_documents FROM related_information WHERE info_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents WHERE document_name LIKE 'Contract%';
SELECT document_id, document_text FROM legal_documents WHERE document_id > 10;
SELECT agreement_name, agreement_details FROM agreements WHERE agreement_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM case_studies ORDER BY case_study_name DESC;
SELECT info_name, related_documents FROM related_information WHERE info_id = 5;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM legal_documents;
SELECT agreement_name, agreement_date FROM agreements ORDER BY agreement_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, case_outcome FROM case_studies WHERE case_outcome='Successful';
SELECT info_name, info_type FROM related_information WHERE info_type='Important' LIMIT 5;
SELECT reference_name, reference_content FROM reference_data WHERE reference_type='Guide' ORDER BY reference_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM legal_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type='Contract';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM legal_documents ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name, parties_involved FROM agreements WHERE agreement_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT reference_name, reference_type, LENGTH(reference_content) AS content_length FROM reference_data WHERE reference_type='Regulation';
